title: B minor figured bass - cadential 6-4 - inv 7th

content.question: Part-writing from figured bass Realize the figured bass below in four voices, following traditional eighteenth-century voice-leading procedures. Continue logically from the spacing of the first chord. Do not add embellishments unless indicated by the figured bass. On the blank below each chord, write the Roman numeral that appropriately indicates harmonic function.

frqParts.text: Part-writing from figured bass Realize the figured bass below in four voices, following traditional eighteenth-century voice-leading procedures. Continue logically from the spacing of the first chord. Do not add embellishments unless indicated by the figured bass. On the blank below each chord, write the Roman numeral that appropriately indicates harmonic function.

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Complete a four-part harmonic progression by realizing a figured bass line and providing a Roman numeral analysis of the completed progression.
